dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, travel routes, settlements, places of historical interest.
Lower right margin: "Dese Kaart wert gestelt voor het capittel numeri" -- "3".
2 pictorial vignettes: [Encampments of the Israelites and Moses at Mt. Sinai] -- De hout-vlotten Huram.
